general_advisory: As per IMD forecast, Dry weather is expected for the next 4 days and light rain on the last day (31st). As there is a chance of dry weather conditions along with an increase in maximum temperature, farmers are advised to apply fertilizer after draining out excess water under waterlogged conditions and continue spraying operations during that period. Prevailing weather conditions are favorable for pest and disease incidence. Farmers are advised to monitor the fields regularly. Avoid grazing/feeding of cattle during noon hours due to an expected increase in maximum temperature in upcoming days.
